name: obsidian-link-maintainer
description: Help maintain and update links in Obsidian notes when files are renamed.

scripts.build: npm run prettier && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json build && [ -f styles.css ] && cp styles.css build/ || true
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && node version-changelog.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json CHANGELOG.md && cp manifest.json build/
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && gh release create $npm_package_version -F CHANGELOG.md --draft build/main.js manifest.json $([ -f styles.css ] && echo 'styles.css' || true)

author: wenlzhang
